fields.description:
*Assessment*

After upgrading from Eucalyptus 3.4.2 to Eucalyptus 4.0.0 (4.0.0-0.0.1042.20140517git09d5e9eb.el6.x86_64), instance store-backed paravirtual EMI fails to be converted.  Upon further inspection, the following error is seen within the Image Worker instance in worker.log:
{code}
2014-05-19 00:27:58,485 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-e83683fc) lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 7 May 19 00:27 /dev/mapper/euca-dsk-emi-B14A3752 -> ../dm-6
2014-05-19 00:27:58,494 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-e83683fc) Traceback (most recent call last):
2014-05-19 00:27:58,494 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-e83683fc) File "/usr/libexec/eucalyptus/euca-run-workflow", line 524, in <module>
2014-05-19 00:27:58,495 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-e83683fc) WORKFLOWS[args.name].execute(args)
2014-05-19 00:27:58,495 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-e83683fc) File "/usr/libexec/eucalyptus/euca-run-workflow", line 227, in execute
2014-05-19 00:27:58,495 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-e83683fc) args=args) # the rest of the arguments are inherited from run-workflow's command-line
2014-05-19 00:27:58,495 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-e83683fc) File "/usr/libexec/eucalyptus/euca-run-workflow", line 175, in bundle_and_upload
2014-05-19 00:27:58,495 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-e83683fc) if (args.image_size != None):
2014-05-19 00:27:58,496 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-e83683fc) AttributeError: 'Namespace' object has no attribute 'image_size'
2014-05-19 00:27:58,513 worker [ERROR]:(import-is-e83683fc) euca-run-workflow returned code: 1
{code}

*Signs*

*Steps*

* Set up Eucalyptus 3.4.2 Cloud, with Load Balancer service enabled
* Bundle, upload and register instance store-backed paravirtual EMIs
* Upgrade to Eucalyptus 4.0.0 cloud
* Add Image Worker Image
* Launch instance based on instance store-backed paravirtual EMIs
* Observe instances failing to launch; observe errors in worker.log
fields.summary: Image Worker Fails to Convert Instance Store-Backed Paravirtual EMI - AttributeError: 'Namespace' object has no attribute 'image_size'
